title: A new hotel trend that puts you to sleep — literally
description: From beds that use artificial intelligence to on-call hypnotherapists, more hotels are luring travelers in by promising a good night's sleep.

title: Mercedes to release a smaller version of its G Class luxury SUV
description: Mercedes plans to launch a smaller version of its high-end G Class sports utility vehicle but did not give a specific date for its release.

title: U.S. Commerce Secretary says she 'didn't pull any punches' during recent visit to China
description: Gina Raimondo met with Chinese officials in a high-stakes trip this week.

title: U.S. expat in New Zealand was 'embarrassed' this moving cost tripled his budget—but has no regrets
description: One American couple learned that moving to New Zealand with their pets would cost them.

title: Why youth unemployment is surging in China
description: The world's second-most populous country has a major youth unemployment problem.
